metadata.synopsis: Gale notices Mystra's statue in the Stormshore Tabernacle. There's some player interactivity if they choose  to interact on whether this ends up being an act of defiance/prayer/rejection,
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter in S_LOW_StormshoreTabernacle_VB_RespectsToMystra_277ab143-0e43-4046-951b-2880c628ca36 with Gale in the party.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Mystra's likeness... It's been some time since I stood before her in a place like this...

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Ah, there's a shrine to Lolth in the corner there. Excuse me while I spit on it.
2.context: NodeContext: SH: Abandoned shar and loyal to shar variants
